title: Weekly Grocery Planner
prompt:
Create a weekly grocery planner for {family_size}. Include:
Daily meal breakdown
Grocery list
Approximate cost per category

responses.gpt-5:
Here’s a comprehensive **weekly grocery planner for 5 people** with daily meal breakdown, grocery list, and approximate costs per category. Costs are estimated for India (INR).

---

## Weekly Meal Planner for 5

| Day | Breakfast | Lunch | Snack | Dinner |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Monday | Poha / Upma + Tea | Rice, Dal, Mixed Veg Curry, Salad | Fruits / Roasted Chickpeas | Chapati, Paneer Butter Masala, Raita |
| Tuesday | Idli / Dosa + Coconut Chutney | Lemon Rice, Sambar, Papad | Nuts / Banana | Chapati, Chicken Curry, Veg Stir-Fry |
| Wednesday | Oats Porridge / Cereal + Milk | Chapati, Rajma, Rice, Salad | Fruits / Chivda | Vegetable Pulao, Raita, Salad |
| Thursday | Paratha + Yogurt / Pickle | Rice, Fish Curry, Veg | Sprouts / Nuts | Chapati, Mixed Veg Curry, Dal |
| Friday | Bread + Eggs / Omelette | Chapati, Chole, Rice, Salad | Fruits / Cookies | Chapati, Mutton Curry, Veg Stir-Fry |
| Saturday | Dhokla / Poha | Vegetable Khichdi + Papad | Tea + Biscuits | Pizza / Pasta / Homemade Burger |
| Sunday | Pancakes / French Toast | Rice, Dal, Vegetable Curry | Ice Cream / Fruit Salad | Chapati, Paneer Tikka Masala, Salad |

## Weekly Grocery List for 5 People

### Grains & Cereals
Rice 10 kg, Wheat Flour 7 kg, Oats 1 kg, Poha 1 kg, Dhokla/Besan 500 g, Bread 3 loaves

### Vegetables & Fruits
Onion 3 kg, Tomato 3 kg, Potato 3 kg, Carrot 1 kg, Mixed Veg 4 kg, Leafy Greens 1 kg, Banana 2 dozen, Apples/Seasonal Fruits 2 kg

### Dairy & Eggs
Milk 14 liters, Yogurt 3 kg, Paneer 1.5 kg, Eggs 30

### Meat & Fish
Chicken 2 kg, Mutton 1 kg, Fish 1.5 kg

### Pulses & Lentils
Dal 3 kg, Rajma/Chole 1.5 kg, Sambar Dal/Urad 1 kg

### Spices, Oil & Condiments
Cooking Oil 2 L, Ghee/Butter 500 g, Salt/Sugar/Spices Assorted, Tea/Coffee Assorted, Pickles/Chutneys Assorted

### Snacks & Miscellaneous
Nuts & Dry Fruits 500 g, Biscuits 500 g, Ice Cream 1.5 L, Sprouts/Chickpeas 500 g

## Approximate Total Cost per Category (INR)
Grains & Cereals 1,760, Vegetables & Fruits 1,280, Dairy & Eggs 1,900, Meat & Fish 1,750, Pulses & Lentils 950, Spices/Oil/Condiments 1,150, Snacks/Miscellaneous 1,000

**Total Weekly Cost ≈ 9,790 INR**
responses.gemini-2.5:
Sample weekly grocery planner for a family of 5. Budget-friendly, versatile meals, approximate US costs $170-$255 per week.

## Weekly Meal Breakdown
Mon: Oatmeal, Banana, Milk / Turkey Sandwich / Slow Cooker Pulled Chicken
Tue: Cereal, Milk, Berries / Leftovers / Tacos
Wed: Toast+Eggs / Leftovers / Pasta
Thu: Oatmeal, Applesauce / Leftovers / Sheet Pan Chicken
Fri: Cereal, Milk / Leftovers / Pizza
Sat: Pancakes / Leftovers / Chili
Sun: Eggs, Toast / Leftovers / Family Choice (stir-fry, grilled cheese)

## Grocery List
Protein/Meat: Chicken 3-4 lbs, Ground Beef 2 lbs, Sausage 1-1.5 lbs, Eggs 2 dozen, Deli Turkey 1 lb
Produce: Bananas, Apples, Berries, Lettuce, Carrots, Onion, Garlic, Potatoes, Tomatoes, Frozen Veg
Dairy: Milk, Cheese, Sour Cream, Butter
Pantry: Bread, Pasta, Cereal, Oats, Taco Shells, Buns, Pizza Dough, Rice
Canned/Misc: Beans, Tomatoes, Broth, Spices, Condiments

## Approximate Weekly Cost
Protein/Meat $60–$90, Produce $40–$60, Dairy $30–$45, Pantry $30–$40, Canned/Misc $10–$20, Total $170–$255
